title: Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, Unscented, 50 Count
descriptions:
Introducing the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, designed with simplicity and convenience in mind. These trash bags come in a pack of 50, ensuring you have an ample supply to keep your kitchen clean and tidy. With a capacity of 13 gallons, these bags can hold a significant amount of waste, making them perfect for daily use.

Our trash bags are made from tear-resistant white plastic, ensuring durability and preventing any unwanted leaks or spills. The unscented feature ensures there are no overpowering odors, providing a pleasant and odor-free environment.

Featuring the innovative Flex-tra strength, these bags are designed to withstand heavy loads, making them perfect for disposing of kitchen waste, including food scraps, without worrying about any tears or rips.

The red drawstring closure makes it easy to secure and tie the bag, preventing any unwanted spills or messes. It provides a hassle-free experience, especially for those who may have difficulty tying knots or handling traditional closures.

For added convenience, these trash bags are compatible with Alexa voice shopping. Simply use your voice to reorder and restock your supply effortlessly.

Choose the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags for a reliable and user-friendly solution to your kitchen waste management needs. Keep your kitchen clean, organized, and odor-free with these high-quality trash bags.
